ACTION_SEND_DATA - Static variable in class com.g2mobility.xbee.G2BeeConstants
Intent action to send data to XBee device.
ACTION_SET_PARAMETER - Static variable in class com.g2mobility.xbee.G2BeeConstants
Intent action to set XBee parameter

Extras "addr", "cmd" and "value" should be provided indicating the remote XBee address, the parameter and the value to set.
